title: Can Large Vision-Language Models Detect Images Copyright Infringement from GenAI?
author: Qipan Xu (Rutgers University), Zhenting Wang (Rutgers University), Xiaoxiao He (Rutgers University), Ligong Han (Rutgers University), Ruixiang Tang (Rutgers University), ...
relevance_why: This paper discusses large vision-language models (LVLMs) in the context of intellectual property rights, which may intersect with audio-related copyright issues in generative media.
background: The paper evaluates the ability of LVLMs to identify potential copyright infringement in generated images, focusing on well-known intellectual property figures.
contribution: This paper introduces a benchmark dataset to evaluate LVLM's ability to detect copyright infringement, achieving notable insights into the models' performance limitations.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Existing models lack a robust framework for assessing copyright infringement detection capabilities.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work provides a systematic evaluation using a newly created dataset with both infringing and non-infringing examples, improving upon the lack of comprehensive benchmarks.

key_innovation: Constructs a dedicated benchmark dataset combining generated positive and negative samples to rigorously assess the performance of LVLMs in detecting copyright infringement.
real_world_impact: The findings can inform the development of more effective AI content moderation tools, supporting the protection of intellectual property in the digital age.
limitations: The authors acknowledge that the evaluation may not align perfectly with legal definitions of copyright infringement due to subjective annotation processes.

new_terms.large vision-language models (LVLMs): Models that integrate visual and textual data to perform tasks involving understanding and generating content from both modalities.
new_terms.IP infringement: Intellectual Property infringement refers to the unauthorized use or reproduction of protected intellectual property, including copyrights.
